original_text: So Moses did what the Lord had told him. He took the stick from its place in the Lord's Tent of Meeting.
korean_text: 모세가 그 명령대로 여호와 앞에서 지팡이를 잡으니라

sentences.original_text: So Moses did what the Lord had told him
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 모세는 주께서 그에게 명하신 것을 행하였고

sentences.original_text: He took the stick from its place
in the Lord's Tent of Meeting
